file(COPY  bug_813_son.cir CMakeLists.txt tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_813_SON/bug_813_son.cir COMMAND ${XYCE_BINARY} bug_813_son.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_813_SON/bug_813_son.cir PROPERTY FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "FAILED: Measure exceeds failure value")
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_813_SON/bug_813_son.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;leadcurrents;mos1")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_813_SON/bug_813_son.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug_813_son.cir)
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_813_SON/bug_813_son.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY} bug_813_son.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_813_SON/bug_813_son.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;parallel;nightly;leadcurrents;mos1")
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_813_SON/bug_813_son.cir PROPERTY FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION "FAILED: Measure exceeds failure value")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_813_SON/bug_813_son.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP bug_813_son.cir)
endif()
